<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Magic Rider](/Feats.aspx?ID=1415) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 43 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your people used powerful magic to travel between distant worlds, and the remnants of that magic make such transportation easier for you. When you are the target of a [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) spell that transports more than one person, it can affect an additional person beyond the normal limit, chosen by the caster. Additionally, when you're the target of a [_teleport_](/Spells.aspx?ID=338) spell, you and the other targets arrive no farther than 1 mile off target, regardless of distance traveled.
name: Magic Rider
